channel.title: Python on Blog - Mauro de Carvalho

item.title: Why I learned Python
item.description: About eleven years ago, after finishing my first semester in University I decided to learn how to program in Python. In this post I will talk about why I found Python interesting at the time as well as how it felt to me as someone with little programming knowledge.
